summary: Everything You Need to Know About Punisher Season 2 - Release Date, Cast, Villains, Story, and More!
title: Everything You Need to Know About Punisher Season 2 - Release Date, Cast, Villains, Story, and More!
body:
Everything You Need to Know About Punisher Season 2 – Release Date, Cast, Villains, Story, and More!

The first season of Netflix’s The Punisher was amazing. It mixed the comic anti-heroes’ traditional motivations with a gritty realism that mirrored our current world. Not many TV shows, let alone comic book based shows, have been successful at doing that.

The show’s portrayal of how PTSD affects the mindsof people was, in my opinion, the best I’ve ever seen on television. It also respected those…

View On WordPress

summary: Marvel's New Warriors Stars Want Their Show to Replace Roseanne on ABC
title: Marvel's New Warriors Stars Want Their Show to Replace Roseanne on ABC
excerpt: Following the cancellation of Roseanne, the New Warriors cast has taken to social media to lobby for their show to replace the booted sitcom.
description:
So, if you are on Twitter (or watch cable TV busy with everything but hurricane that hit Puerto Rico they should be talking about) you probably know that big return of the Roseanne sitcom on ABC has been canceled after the main star turned out to be too much of a racist to be worth keeping around (way too late). This leaves an empty spot in ABC’s programming. And the cast of New Warriors, which was supposed to go on Freeform but has been dropped and Disney has been looking for a place for it ever since is trying to convince people to give that spot to their show.

I hope they succeed.

- Admin

summary: mmm, i know i said i wouldn’t update anything until friday but i’m a lying bitch and i updated Entwined In Frost, the King...
body:
mmm, i know i said i wouldn’t update anything until friday but i’m a lying bitch and i updated Entwined In Frost, the King Arthur!Steve & Merlin!Loki AU (except… not exactly. it’s complicated and it’s both in the 80s of america and the fifth century of wales & england)

mmmm, i’m… excited about this ‘verse because like, as i’ve set it in the late 80s, we have people like abigail brand and phil coulson who are only gonna be young trainees in SWORD and SHIELD respectively; nick fury hasn’t lost his eye yet, and is a lot less bitter but coming right off the back of the cold war, and alexander pierce is my main antagonist as he is both the leader of shield and the uther pendragon

but i’ve been super surprised by the response to it thus far - i’m aware that like, it’s definitely gonna be different from most fics simply because in the 80s, and thus 90% of the avengers just aren’t gonna be feasible as allies, ‘cause they’re all babies, but it’s definitely a ‘verse i’m really excited about building on because it’s so Different from anything i’ve done before

and yet i’m also like “it’s so out there tho, dictionary, wtf, how can you have 2 separate universes running at the same time with dream-sharing and shit” but it’s so fun

SO WE’LL SEE.

blog.description: Masterlist link doesn't work. Search in my page the tag #rogue-barnes-16 masterlist. ••• Requests are open! In my Masterlist there's a link that will take you to the characters I write about ••• To be added to my taglists send an ask.

tags: in this life or in the next
summary: IN THIS LIFE OR IN THE NEXT MASTERLIST
body:
IN THIS LIFE OR IN THE NEXT MASTERLIST

SUMMARY: Bucky Barnes moved with the Avengers a while ago, trying to have a regular life. It seems to work until one day he bumps into a girl who brought up some memories to Bucky’s mind. However, the memories are, like always, bizarre, and all he could distinguish was a name, Matilda Smyth.

I hope the plot isn’t too confusing.

Aesthetic by @buckyy–papi-chulo–smuttttt

___–___–___–___–___–___–___

Season 1:

CHAPTER I: Does it ring a bell?

CHAPTER II: Matilda Smyth

CHAPTER III: Who are you?

CHAPTER IV: Dreams and reality

CHAPTER V: The touch

CHAPTER VI: Y/n Y/l/n

CHAPTER VII: Photos and sketches

CHAPTER VIII: Facing the fears

CHAPTER IX: Nightmares

CHAPTER X: Help

CHAPTER XI: Fixing the mess

CHAPTER XII: Talking it out

Season 2:

CHAPTER XIII: Moving on

CHAPTER XIV: Lies of omission

CHAPTER XV: Overwhelmed by her ghost

Chapter XVI:

{ON HIATUS}

—__—__—__—__—__—__—

The updates of each next chapter will be posted between Sunday and Monday.

If you want to be tagged, send me an ask.

—__—__—__—__—__—__—

Tags: @stevieboyharrington @dyanna-corona @girlwhoisfearless @n7siha @pizzarollpatrol @xdxingridxxd @iconicvaleria @amazingficsthatididnotwrite @butifulsoul125

Permanent taglist: @notexactlythatgirl @thisismysecrethappyplace @sofreakinmanyfandoms @pizzarollpatrol @bubblycypress87 @almostmellowsalad @loislp @lovenaturefirst @dyanna-corona @2ptonpt

Updated on November 10th

summary:
DEATH WINS
WHO WILL DEATH CLAIM IN THE INFINITY WARS?
 
 This summer, INFINITY WARS is set to take over Marvel Comics. But the...
body:
DEATH WINS

WHO WILL DEATH CLAIM IN THE INFINITY WARS?

This summer, INFINITY WARS is set to take over Marvel Comics. But the promotion touts that “Death Wins”? And who the heck is Requiem? Acclaimed creators Gerry Duggan (Deadpool) and Mike Deodato Jr. (Old Man Logan) are bringing you an Infinity Stone story that will change the Marvel Universe…and the lives of those who wield the cosmic stones!

INFINITY WARS #1

Written by Gerry Duggan

Art and Cover by Mike Deodato Jr.

Colors by Frank Martin

On Sale 8/1/18

Additional Covers:

For up-to-date information on all new #1 titles, visit http://marvel.com/marvel2018comics.

To find a comic shop near you, visit www.comicshoplocator.com

or simply chat with some of your favorite heroes with Marvel’s chatbot accessible through Twitter and Facebook.

About Marvel Entertainment

Marvel, a wholly-owned subsidiary of The Walt Disney Company, is one of the world’s most prominent character-based entertainment companies, built on a proven library of more than 8,000 characters featured in a variety of media over seventy-five years.  Marvel utilizes its character franchises in entertainment, licensing and publishing.

For more information visit marvel.com.

 

[Comic Book News] Death is Coming! But Who Will Suffer Their Timely Demise in Marvel’s INFINITY WARS? DEATH WINS WHO WILL DEATH CLAIM IN THE INFINITY WARS? This summer, INFINITY WARS is set to take over…

or simply chat with some of your favorite heroes with Marvel’s chatbot accessible through Twitter and Facebook.

About Marvel Entertainment

Marvel, a wholly-owned subsidiary of The Walt Disney Company, is one of the world’s most prominent character-based entertainment companies, built on a proven library of more than 8,000 characters featured in a variety of media over seventy-five years.  Marvel utilizes its character franchises in entertainment, licensing and publishing.

For more information visit marvel.com.

 

[Comic Book News] Death is Coming! But Who Will Suffer Their Timely Demise in Marvel’s INFINITY WARS? DEATH WINS WHO WILL DEATH CLAIM IN THE INFINITY WARS? This summer, INFINITY WARS is set to take over…
trail.content:
DEATH WINS

WHO WILL DEATH CLAIM IN THE INFINITY WARS?

External image

This summer, INFINITY WARS is set to take over Marvel Comics. But the promotion touts that “Death Wins”? And who the heck is Requiem? Acclaimed creators Gerry Duggan (Deadpool) and Mike Deodato Jr. (Old Man Logan) are bringing you an Infinity Stone story that will change the Marvel Universe…and the lives of those who wield the cosmic stones!

External image

INFINITY WARS #1

Written by Gerry Duggan

Art and Cover by Mike Deodato Jr.

Colors by Frank Martin

On Sale 8/1/18

Additional Covers:

For up-to-date information on all new #1 titles, visit http://marvel.com/marvel2018comics.

To find a comic shop near you, visit www.comicshoplocator.com

or simply chat with some of your favorite heroes with Marvel’s chatbot accessible through Twitter and Facebook.

For more information visit marvel.com.
